commit message: Refactored to use Androidannotations with RoboGuice 1.1 (not 2.0 since it won't work with Androidannotations).
Refactored tests to use mocks defined in TestModule.
Added project lombok. Refactored classes not to use the Android Location class but own dataholder for location (GPS and XY).
Use stable version of Androidannotations. Some Lombok related changes.
Refactored much canvas related drawing code to own class from animationview.
Prefer using RoboGuice tasks for background processes instead of AA.
Moved scaling and gesture related stuff to util class.
Moved bounds calculation to util class.
Fixed bug which caused shared preferences to use wrong filename after downgrading to roboguice 1.1.
Fixed crash when resuming from app killed.
